title: Provide a decade of student debt relief to Americans
more_information: This refers specifically to Biden's proposed plan. Most estimates put that plan at 300 billion over 30 years, so 100 billion over 10 years is a ham-fisted estimate. One thing to note is that most of the costs would be up-front, so really this should say 'Fulfill a third of Biden's student debt relief plan', but that doesn't really roll off the tongue as well.

title: Do a year's worth of roadway repairs for all of the roads in America
more_information: In order to keep existing roads in “acceptable repair” and fix the poor ones over a six-year period, it’s estimated that the country would need $231.4 billion per year.
